briefTitle: Coronary Flow Reserve to Assess Cardiovascular Inflammation (CIRT-CFR)
officialTitle: Coronary Flow Reserve to Assess Cardiovascular Inflammation (CIRT-CFR)

primary.measure: Change in Global Myocardial Blood Flow in Response to Vasodilator
primary.description: Change (from baseline) in global coronary flow reserve in response to vasodilator as measured by PET imaging at baseline and at one year
